Name: The Far Kingdoms: Hidden Magic
About the game: A new adventure in the Far Kingdoms awaits you! Solve the puzzles and search for hidden clues to find who is responsible for King's untimely death. Choose your avatar and travel far and wide across the kingdom to solve hidden object puzzles. Meet interesting characters that will help you solve the royal mystery. If you just might run into the traitor of the crown. Seek and find hidden objects in beautiful scenes around the royal village and castle. Zoom in and out of crafted scenes and see if you can spot the mystery clues lurking in the shadows... Can you solve the hidden object mystery? - Beautiful graphics - Enchanting locations - 4 game modes - Unlimited hints - Use various search tools - Solve puzzles
